Hello, World!

30 Sep 2022 - Max

Welcome

Hello World, this my first blog post.

class HelloWorld
   def initialize(name)
      @name = name.capitalize
   end
   def say
      puts "Hello #{@name}!"
   end
end

hello = HelloWorld.new("Max")
hello.say
